section.title:
receiving labels printing by p/o
purchase orders printing receiving labels for Print Receiving Labels by P/O #
section.para: To print Receiving labels by Purchase Order Number, select the "Print Receiving Labels by P/O #" option. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Print Receiving Labels by Purchase Order Number

section.para: When printing Receiving labels by Purchase Order Number, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the Purchase Order Number of the Purchase Order whose Receiving labels you want to print.
Specify the name of the Shipping Label Form you want to print.
Specify the range of Receiving labels you want to print.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without printing any Receiving labels, returning you to the application desktop.
Prints specified number of Receiving label copies for the specified Purchase Order.
